-671d33a1: Hey Izayla Women! Did you know that we use to offer our Signature Tie Front Jumpsuit in extended sizes? Unfortunately, we had to remove these sizes from our collection as not many women were purchasing them. Our findings turned out that creating extended sizes requires more fabric yardage than regular sizing, which can be quite costly.
-1113124e: You may have also noticed that some brands charge more for their extended sizes, which is not fair. But here's the good news - we are now offering custom services for our Signature Tie Front Jumpsuit exclusively! That means you can get a custom jumpsuit in any size or color you desire. Regular size or Extended size! Essentially "made to order".

5306f694: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from izayla.us (the “Site”).
-47c18812: When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site. We refer to this automatically-collected information as “Device Information.”
43235a20: We collect Device Information using the following technologies:
5f8cd085: - “Cookies” are data files that are placed on your device or computer and often include an anonymous unique identifier. For more information about cookies, and how to disable cookies, visit http://www.allaboutcookies.org.
147ed069: - “Log files” track actions occurring on the Site, and collect data including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps.
7a4262ba: - “Web beacons,” “tags,” and “pixels” are electronic files used to record information about how you browse the Site.
-6ab336b1: Additionally when you make a purchase or attempt to make a purchase through the Site, we collect certain information from you, including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment information (including credit card numbers, Paypal and Apple Pay), email address, and phone number. We refer to this information as “Order Information.”
-55d1524: When we talk about “Personal Information” in this Privacy Policy, we are talking both about Device Information and Order Information.
-2f30d814: HOW DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
-58ea8433: We use the Order Information that we collect generally to fulfill any orders placed through the Site (including processing your payment information, arranging for shipping, and providing you with invoices and/or order confirmations). Additionally, we use this Order Information to:
-676115fa: Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud; and
65964b87: When in line with the preferences you have shared with us, provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services.
-6a48d2e9: We use the Device Information that we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimize our Site (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns).
4643276a: We share your Personal Information with third parties to help us use your Personal Information, as described above. For example, we use Shopify to power our online store--you can read more about how Shopify uses your Personal Information here: https://www.shopify.com/legal/privacy. We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site--you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/. You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.
41bed881: Finally, we may also share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.
2e0dd7fc: Please note that we do not alter our Site’s data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.
68b46e36: If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below.
724aabc6: Additionally, if you are a European resident we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfill contracts we might have with you (for example if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above. Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe, including to Canada and the United States.
-567539da: When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Order Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.
-eb3ab20: We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.
1027b9ed: For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at info@izayla.us.

-728a23f0: Founded IZAYLA while studying Apparel Industry Management and Business Management at the Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising Institute
3c5c087f: Debuted IZAYLA in Los Angeles at Art Hearts Fashion during Fashion Week.
2dcc5075: Showcased collection with Flying Solo in New York.
7c77ef5b: Entered our first showroom, ECTERA, in Los Angeles and received our first celebrity placement on Blac Chyna.
-196d4214: Stocked at our first boutique in Miami, Circular by Pablo Delgado
-1ff3d362: Stocked at Elyse Walker in Pacific Palisades.
4606eb5a: Awarded $50,000 in manufacturing support as one of 11 selected Black-owned brands by Be Resonant.
-3fcbf19: Gabrielle Union wore our signature tie front jumpsuit on Good Morning America, later featured in PopSugar highlighting the look.
3ce9cc9b: Received the Buy From a Black Woman Trademark Grant to further support brand growth.
-7a1573f0: Selected as one of the Top 25 brands for the inaugural Raise Fashion Fashion Row Accelerator Program.
-438e86ec: Stocked at Saks Fifth Avenue online and in select stores including Beverly Hills, New York, and Houston.
397555fa: Presented IZAYLA’s Spring/Summer ‘22 Collection in New York at The Gehry.
a173ba5: Collaborated with the Emerge in Color + Beverly Center to showcase the brand alongside 20+ other Black-owned businesses.
3a6cb091: Kelly Rowland wore IZAYLA’s signature jumpsuit to perform at the Coldplay concert—sparking viral attention.
6d39a4fb: Selected by the Black in Fashion Council to showcase IZAYLA at New York Fashion Week in partnership with Mailchimp.
55f96c0: Featured in major publications including Forbes, Huffington Post, PopSugar, Jezebel, WWD, The Zoe Report, and Fashionista.
